label: ham
subject:
Rev 297: kill the lockwait child if the pipe goes away in
	http://samba.org/~tridge/ctdb
body: 28 (return) [ Parcens innocentiae Aviti, is the compassionate, but contemptuous, language of Victor Tunnunensis, (in Chron. apud Scaliger Euseb.) In another place, he calls him, vir totius simplicitatis. This commendation is more humble, but it is more solid and sincere, than the praises of Sidonius]
